short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Join our journey to 2040 Net Zero Carbon emissions with our Feel Good Shopping feature.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_U:
OVERVIEW

Shop online as normal at 40,000 + retailers and see offers automatically appear
Generate funds to donate and support green projects
Use our Earthmark rating to choose sustainable retailers
 
 
HOW IT WORKS
The Feel Good Shopping Feature is powered by Kindred. Kindred collects savings from brands automatically so they can pass on those savings to you. Firstly they check if there is a deal available when you first land on a site and then will activate this deal. Kindred does not collect any data on you other than checking if they have a deal for a site as you shop. If there is a deal present, after the purchase is complete this money saved will be collected in your O2 wallet and then you can choose which green initiatives to support. You will also see the Earthmark sustainability rating which empowers you to shop with sustainable brands. This is a feature which provides you with a simple 0-5 leaf rating with 5 representing retailers leading the fight against climate change by having a net-positive impact on the environment. Finally, at checkout you will also automatically receive discount codes and offers to save money on your shopping.
 
GREEN PROJECTS WE SUPPORT
Hubbub
Fund climate projects
Grow your forest
long.en_GB:
OVERVIEW
Join our journey to 2025 Net Zero Carbon emissions. Use our Feel Good Shopping feature to save money and help save the planet.
Shop online as normal at 40,000 + retailer and see offers automatically appear
Generate funds to donate to support green projects
Use our Earthmark rating to choose sustainable retailers
 
 
HOW IT WORKS
The Feel Good Shopping Feature is powered by Kindred. Kindred collects savings from brands automatically so they can pass on those savings to you. Firstly they check if there is a deal available when you first land on a site and then will activate this deal. Kindred does not collect any data on you other than checking if they have a deal for a site as you shop. If there is a deal present, after the purchase is complete this money saved will be collected in your O2 wallet and then you can choose which green initiatives to support. You will also see The Earthmark sustainability rating which empowers you to shop with sustainable brands. This is a feature which is provides you with a simple 0-5 leaf rating with 5 representing retailers leading the fight against climate change by having a net positive impact on the environment. Finally, at checkout you will also automatically receive discount codes and offers to save money on your shopping.
